data_descriptor.name: value
data_descriptor.description: A set of key-value pairs indicating the number of transitions between the types of locations where the key defines the position pairs.

algorithm.description: Sample is a dictionary. Key represents the transition and the corresponding value represents the number of transition. For example, transition between home to work will have 'Home Work' as key and the number of transition from 'Home' to 'Work' in a day as value.
